car.picker.client
Class CarPoint

java.lang.Object
  car.shared.math.Point2D
      car.picker.client.CarPoint
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
public class CarPoint
extends Point2D

A point representing a car in an image. Contains location and size information, and can store a Color attribute. Supplies the draw(Surface) method for drawing itself onto a Surface.

Author:
Joshua Little

public CarPoint()

See Also:
CarPoint(double, double, boolean)

CarPoint

public CarPoint(double x,
                double y,
                boolean movable)
Creates an instance of CarPoint located at the specified coordinates. Is initially movable if movable is set to true.

Parameters:
x - the x-coordinate of the new CarPoint.
y - the y-coordinate of the new CarPoint.
movable - whether the new CarPoint should be movable.
See Also:
CarPoint()
Method Detail

draw

public void draw(gwt.g2d.client.graphics.Surface ctx)
Draws this CarPoint onto the supplied Surface. Will fill and stroke a circle of size drawRadius in the CarPoint's fill color and stroke

Parameters:
ctx - the Surface to draw on.
See Also:
getFillColor(), getStrokeColor()

isMovable

public boolean isMovable()
Returns whether this CarPoint should be movable by user-interaction.

Returns:
true if this CarPoint should be movable, false otherwise.
See Also:
setMovable(boolean)

onPoint

public boolean onPoint(Point2D point)
Returns true if the supplied Point2D are within the clickable area of this CarPoint. The clickable area is defined by a circle centered at this point with a radius of getSelectRadius().

Parameters:
point - the point to test.
Returns:
true if the point is within the clickable area, false otherwise.
See Also:
onPoint(double, double)

onPoint

public boolean onPoint(double cx,
                       double cy)
Returns true if the supplied coordinates are within the clickable area of this CarPoint. The clickable area is defined by a circle centered at this point with a radius of getSelectRadius().

Parameters:
cx - x-coordinate to test.
cy - y-coordinate to test.
Returns:
true if the point is within the clickable area, false otherwise.
See Also:
onPoint(Point2D)

getSelectRadius

public double getSelectRadius()
Returns the radius of the circle defining the clickable area of this CarPoint.

Returns:
the clickable dimension.
See Also:
setSelectRadius(double)

setSelectRadius

public void setSelectRadius(double selectRadius)
Sets the radius of the circle defining the clickable area of this CarPoint.

Parameters:
selectRadius - the new clickable dimension.
See Also:
getSelectRadius()
